titles.title: To discharge the qualified loan amounts of each individual, and for other purposes.
Student Loan Debt Relief Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
